column4: gentlemen, how's about that SRU thing and updates? were there any updates of feisty during last four weeks? maybe there is something wrong with update-manager? my english is poor, so i would be really gratefull for a clear answer. thank you very much. anyone?
if you don't get a reply, don't repeat, rephrase. It is not clear to me what "that SRU thing" is.
